name: The Golden Touch by Ekansh Mehta

metadata.name: The Golden Touch #1
metadata.description:
If you will ask me about the best time of the day for me,then it will be the time during early morning(sunrise) when the daylight is redder and softer than when the sun is higher in the sky.

Golden hour also known as ‘Magic hour’ gives the soft touch to the sky and makes the early morning scene more blissful by the calming golden color.
